about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Partner in Digital Transformation
about.description: BEYONEX IT is a leading company in software and technology solutions. We believe that technology should serve businesses, which is why we develop innovative solutions that help companies grow and thrive in the digital age.
about.missionText: We aim to empower businesses to maximize the benefits of technology by delivering advanced software solutions that meet their unique needs and help them achieve their strategic goals.
about.visionText: To be the preferred technology partner for companies in the region, by delivering innovative solutions and exceptional services that create real value for our clients.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive tech solutions covering all your digital needs
services.description: We offer a complete range of technical and software services covering all aspects of your technological needs. From website and app development to enterprise solutions and cybersecurity, we are your trusted partner in your digital journey.

ui.title: UI/UX Enhancement
ui.description: We enhance user interfaces and user experience for your websites and apps to ensure a smooth and engaging experience for your customers

web.title: Web Development
web.description: We design and develop professional, fast-responsive websites that meet your business needs and attract your customers

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android systems that put your business at your customers' fingertips wherever they are

erp.title: ERP Systems
erp.description: Integrated ERP solutions for efficient enterprise resource management and improved operational processes

hardware.title: IT Operation
hardware.description: We provide integrated hardware solutions including devices, servers, and technical infrastructure

software.title: Software Development
software.description: Custom software designed specifically for your needs to improve productivity and efficiency

cybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity
cybersecurity.description: Comprehensive protection for your digital assets with advanced threat detection and compliance solutions.

hero.title: About BEYONEX IT
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Digital Innovation
hero.description: We are a team of passionate technologists dedicated to transforming businesses through innovative software solutions and cutting-edge technology.

story.title: Our Journey
story.subtitle: From a small startup to a leading tech company, our journey has been defined by innovation and excellence.
story.milestone1Desc: BEYONEX IT was founded with a vision to revolutionize digital solutions in the region.
story.milestone2Desc: We grew our team with talented developers, designers, and technology experts.
story.milestone3Desc: Expanded our services internationally, serving clients across multiple countries.
story.milestone4Desc: Recognized as a leading technology solutions provider with numerous awards.

stats.title: Our Achievements
stats.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to excellence and client satisfaction.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do and define who we are.
values.innovationDesc: We constantly explore new technologies and creative solutions to stay ahead.
values.trustDesc: We build lasting relationships based on honesty, transparency, and mutual respect.
values.qualityDesc: We never compromise on quality, ensuring excellence in every project we deliver.
values.growthDesc: We invest in our team's development and embrace challenges as opportunities.
values.passionDesc: We love what we do, and that passion drives us to exceed expectations.
values.excellenceDesc: We strive for perfection in every detail, from code to customer service.

team.title: Our Expert Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate individuals driving our innovation and success.
